import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './ChatSider.css'; import {AiTwotoneSetting} from 'react-icons/ai'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCookies } from "react-cookie"; function ChatSider(){ const [cookie, setCookie, removeCookie] = useCookies(["showChatSider"]); const [showChatSider,setShowChatSider] = useState(false); function showChatSiderFunc(){ console.log(cookie.showChatSider) if(showChatSider) { setShowChatSider(false) removeCookie("showChatSider") }else{ setShowChatSider(true) setCookie("showChatSider", true, {path: "/"}) } } return(
showChatSiderFunc()}> Trò chuyện
{cookie.showChatSider == true ?
Bạn bè
  • Nguyễn Tô Ngọc Thy

: null}
) } export default ChatSider;
